project_descr: Enhancing the Protected Area System in Sulawesi (EPASS) for Biodiversity Conservation

outputs.output_descr: Strengthen PA management in Sulawesi and reduce threats to biodiversity in the PAs by putting in place measures ensuring that the highly unique and globally important biodiversity safeguarded from on-going threats.

document_name: Enhancing the Protected Area System in Sulawesi (E-PASS)
